body_html: I think specifying worker_device as above in function device_setter.replica_device_setter means that your model is data parallel, not model parallel. Maybe my understanding of this function is not correct.

body: I think specifying `worker_device` as above in function `device_setter.replica_device_setter` means that your model is data parallel, not model parallel. Maybe my understanding of this function is not correct.
